label.smartWalletGasRelayerPLR: Smart Wallet fees with PLR token

button.buyWithCardOrApplePay: Buy with a card or Apple Pay

paragraph.doNotSendRealEthOrTokens: Do not send real ETH or ERC20 tokens.

description.activationBenefit: To send any token you need to top up Pillar Tank with PLR first

smartWalletIsNotActivated.title: Unique benefits of Pillar Payment Network for PLR users

description.singleTokenExperience: A single token experience including the ability to send/spend tokens you don’t already own through real-time swaps.

description.smartWalletActivatingStatusCard: Activating your Smart Wallet. It will be ready shortly.

smartWalletIntro.title: Welcome to the Pillar Smart Wallet!

description.intro: The Pillar Smart Wallet replaces the existing Pillar Legacy Wallet and features the following benefits:
description.recovery: It can be recovered from any web-connected device following proper set up.
description.accessToPPN: It provides access to the Pillar Payment Network including instant and gas-free transactions.
description.multipleKeys: It can control multiple keys providing for dapp-specific usage and spending limits.

default.title: To send assets, activate Smart Wallet first
default.description: You will have to pay a small fee

isBeingDeployed.title: Smart Wallet is being deployed now

description.waitingTime: You will be able to send assets once it's deployed. Current average waiting time is {{waitingTimeInMinutes}} mins.

error.needToSetupSmartAccount: You need to top up your Smart Account first.
error.default: There was an error on our server. Please try to re-activate the account by clicking the button bellow.

description.default: To start sending assets you need to activate Smart Wallet

activationModal.paragraph: To start sending and exchanging assets you need to activate your wallet.
activationModal.title: Activate Smart Wallet

paragraph.smartWalletActivating: It won’t take long. While activation is in progress, feel free to explore exciting features of Pillar Smart Wallet

emptyState.title: Token not found
emptyState.paragraph: Check if the name was entered correctly or add custom token

noCollectibles.paragraph: There are no collectibles in this wallet

noneFound.title: Collectible not found

toast.userIsOffline: It seems you're offline. Please check your internet connection.
toast.unableToAddDevice: Couldn't add device, please try again.
toast.keyWalletAssetsTransfered: Assets transferred. Enjoy using your Smart Wallet!
toast.walletRecovered: Your wallet is now recovered. Enjoy using Pillar!
toast.rewardsOnTheirWay: Referral reward is on its way. You will receive it soon.
toast.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, we are already investigating it. Don't worry, your funds are safe. Please try again or contact support.
toast.failedToLogIn: There was a problem logging you in, please try again.
toast.backendProblem: There was a problem on our server. Don't worry, your funds are safe. Please try again or contact support.
toast.PPNWithdraw: Withdraw of {{paymentInfo}} started. You will receive tokens soon.
toast.PPNSettle: Settlement started. You will receive tokens soon.
toast.failedToAddDevice: Can't add device. Please try again.
toast.failedToRemoveDevice: Can't remove device. Please try again.
toast.switchRelayerTokenFailed: Can't switch fee token. Please try again.
toast.syntheticTransactionFailed: Can't make this transaction. Please try again.
toast.ensureBackup: Please ensure you backup your wallet now.
toast.walletConnectUnsupportedApp: This app is not supported. You may request support for this app.
toast.walletConnectSessionTimedOut: Request timeout. Give it another try.
toast.walletConnectSmartWalletNotActive: Can't use Wallet Connect without Smart Wallet activated
toast.cantReadQRCode: Can't read this QR code. Try once again or use another image.
toast.transactionFeeEstimationFailed: Can't estimate transaction fee. Please try again.
toast.walkthroughFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again.
toast.forbiddenToRemoveAsset: {{assetName}} ({{assetSymbol}}) can't be removed. It's essential for Pillar.
toast.failedToGetFaceIDPermission: Face ID restricted for Pillar. You can change it in your phone settings.
toast.subscriptionToNewsletterFailed: Can't subscribe to newsletter. Please try again.
toast.invalidPhoneNumber: Phone number should have country code.
toast.dailyInvitationsLimitReached: You have {{remainingDailyInvitations}} remaining invitations today. Max {{allowedDailyUpdates}} per day
toast.ensNameNotFound: ENS name not found. Try different name.
toast.tooManyTransactionsToSettle: You can settle only {{maxTxToSettle}} transactions at once. You can settle more in another batch.
toast.notEnoughForTransactionFee: Not enough {{feeSymbol}} to pay for transaction fee.
toast.languageChangeFailed: Can't change language. Please try again.
toast.cryptoPurchaseLaunchFailed: Sorry, we had a problem trying to open this service. Please try again later.
toast.exchangeAllowanceFailed: We are sorry. Token allowance could not be set. Please try again.

hideAsset.title: Are you sure?
